Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:! Come to finish the job, have ye? Alright then, Bigjob, come and get it! ... What's that? You're not a bandit? A village you say? Well now, that's convenient ain't it? Name's Ulm, and it'll be a pleasure to meet you once you do me a small favor.]

[Text:When I was younger, young men and women from all over would come through here. Adventurers and gloryseekers, looking to make names for themselves. I can see the same fire in you.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Name:ShopOpen]
[Name:Task_1_Start][Text: Y'see, I twisted my ankle when I was scarpering from some thugs the other day. It would be real sweet of you to find me three $Item_432$, that should patch me up for now.]

[Name:Task_1_End][Text:Is that $Item_162$ I smell? Knew I could count on you, Bigjob. Now let me just... Ah! Much better. So I believe you said something about a town yes? I'll see you there, and we can talk business!]

[Name:Task_2_Start][Text:You call this a town? More like a sad clump of buildings if you ask me... Lucky for you, I am an expert Apothecary. You build me a nice little home to call my own, and I'll see to it that the merchants have more than enough potions and unguents to keep them coming.][UnlockObjectID:18]
